thread.title: Very clean room, fast check in and out and ideally located
thread.title_full: Very clean room, fast check in and out and ideally located - Review of Ibis London Euston St Pancras, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Debsallen27
title: Very clean room, fast check in and out and ideally located
text:
Visited for my birthday this Sunday/Monday. We were spending a couple of days around London, so the location of this hotel was perfect. It is literally right outside euston, there is a back entrance to the station, which takes you straight to the hotel.
Arrived at 3pm, check in was easy. There's no actual reception, so you get approached by a friendly hotel rep who does check in etc in the lobby.
The room was nice, standard and not huge, with a comfy bed and decent bathroom. Not noisy and we had a good nights sleep.
Checked out really easily the next morning, there is a luggage room to use if you're off out and need to come back later but don't fancy taking bags with you!
We returned early evening to retrieve our bags and made quick use of the communal area/bar, where we charged our phones and used the free wifi.
It's a good hotel in a good location, with a nice open lobby for relaxing in.
Would recommend
